Oklahoma_City.KOCY-LP: KOCY-LP, UHF digital channel 48, is an Estrella TV-affiliated television station located in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, United States. The station is owned by the locally based Tyler Media Group, and is a sister station to Univision affiliate KUOK (channel 36) and Telemundo affiliate KTUZ-TV (channel 30). All three stations share studios located near Southeast 51st Street and Shields Boulevard in southern Oklahoma City, and its transmitter near Kelley Avenue (between 70th and 78th Streets) in northeast Oklahoma City.
